subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2291 has been delivered
description_text:
I just opened this package and all it was was two baseplates. Sent from my iPhone On Aug 18, 2025, at 2:33 PM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 





 
 The last item in your order has been delivered 
 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Order #SSN2291
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The last item in your order has been delivered 
 
 
 
 
 Haven't received your package yet? Let us know 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 View your order 
 
 
 
 
 
 or Visit our store
 
 
 


 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 FedEx tracking number: 883590558981
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor × 1 

 
 Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate 
 

 
 
 
 Part of: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor 
 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Matthew Velasquez,    We apologize for the inconvenience. We are currently confirming with our US warehouse staff, as it is possible that they sent the wrong item.
Please provide some pictures showing the labels on the large package and the two small packages inside.

Here are the two separate label and a photo from fedex website on how they were delivered 


>
